Design PhilosophyÂ¶

The idea is to provide a way for quick deployment for Flask applications, and to provide out-of-the-box functionality for many use cases. With the same code base you can deploy many different applications The design philosophy behind biffy is better described with an example:

$ biffy --blueprints blog,contact --port 8008

This command tells biffy to:

  • Use the blueprints blog and contact form
  • Use the built in WSGI service

This is okay for very small or development sites. But what about production sites? You will need to use a production WSGI server.

$ biffy --wsgi uwsgi --wsgi-config uwsgi.ini --blueprints blog,
contact --port 8008
